name: Tiki Towers 2: Monkey Republic
summary: Swing into action with an all-new set of primate puzzles in the sequel to Tiki Towers. Tackle 30 new levels in this hilarious physics-based challenge. Build bridges and towers out of bamboo, coconuts, and vines to overcome water, lava and other hazards. Clear levels with multiple exits, pick up objects that affect your progress, and use the stick challenge to test your skills.
